name: The Historic Jesse Buel Farmhouse w/ Heated Pool
description: 4800ft of living space and an epic backyard make this historic home a true gem. The blueprints for the Jesse Buel House reside in the Library of Congress…for real. The pool is enormous and OPEN TIL early NOV! Hot tub open all year. There is enough furniture for everyone to get cozy. Two kitchens, a billiard room, OLED TVs, luxurious mattresses and eclectic décor make this home truly one of a kind. 35 minutes to Saratoga Race Track with loads of other fantastic attractions within an hour drive.
host_about: Airbnb has transformed every part of my life for the better. What began as a small side hustle has grown into a cornerstone of my own American Dream. As a high school teacher, I’ve always cherished shaping the future, but hosting on Airbnb allows me to fully embrace and enhance my present. It’s become a creative outlet, enabling me to express my passion for art and design by curating unique, welcoming spaces for my guests. I hope to see you soon!

description: Large renovated 1 bedroom apartment in converted police precinct with original tin ceilings. Center Square-the "village in the city." Located in a restored police precinct, you are within walking distance of everything, including verdant Washington Park, restaurants and pubs of Lark St., the state capitol, downtown, Albany Med/Law/Pharmacy.
host_about: I'm from Kansas City, MO. I've driven the entire US, logging over a  million miles on a 10 year working road trip. I settled in Albany, NY, a hardworking, no-nonsense sort of town, drenched in history, education and politics. I love this town not just for the town itself as much as the location. It's truly a sportsman's(sportswoman's) paradise, while being so close to very civilized civilization. There's easy access to NYC, Saratoga, Lake George, Vermont, Montreal & my favorite The Berkshires in Massachusetts.

host_about:
We are fully vaccinated for Covid-19 with boosters. (Mother and daughter) Please note: Bad reviews are from guests breaking my house rules, not reading the listing description about my room spaces and amenities offered. Also, from racists, haters and misogynistic guests.
We are well traveled African American women and we take pride in our culture and ancestors. It is important to be our authentic selves, without being washed.  My home has ethnic food smells, flags, sarcastic signs, Black art, social justice signs and visiable security cameras. Yes! 5 out of eight letters of my name spell SHARE :) I was a home school/unschooled parent. (Florida and Nevada) My daughter graduated from University At Albany with honors. Class of 2020... and recently graduated with a master's degree.  Class of 2021. She is currently a PhD student at Stony Brook University.  We are hosts and guests of Airbnb. I am originally from Chicago and The Bronx. I am a non smoker and non drinker. We traveled to many states on a budget, including Alaska and Hawaii. We also traveled to: Canada, Mexico, Caribbean and Europe.  We loved Victoria, BC, Montreal, QC, Dublin, Ireland, Paris, France and Brussels, Belgium the most.  I love older homes with character and history. I am a proud owner of a "Turn Of A Century"  Classic American Foursquare. unique home. (1900)  Captain Arthur William Brandt was one of the previous owners. I had bought my house. in 1999.  We are passionate about social justice issues. We lived in Miami, Orlando/Winter Park, Las Vegas, Montreal and Dominican Republic. I enjoy watching home improvement shows and documentaries. I love to shop at thrift stores for rare, cultured and vintage finds. We love the beauty and peacefulness of nature. We love musicals and ballets. If your last name is (military) Brandt, (pharmacy) Schneible or (nursing)Wagenbaugh, (previous owners) I will offer you 25% off your daily rate. (Not by marriage) Check your Ancestry, Myheritage and 23andme accounts, we maybe related. ;)  I am 9% England/Wales, 3% South Asian  1% Irish, 3% Norway,  1% Native American, 1% Iberian Peninsula and you can guess the rest...lol...(African)  Maternal Melungeon ancestry.  We share paternal DNA with Ramesses lll...Egyptian royalty and my maternal 2nd great grandfather is Little Wyatt Tate and my maternal 4th great grandfather is Judge/senator Charles Tait of Georgia and Alabama... My daughter is 27% European. Caribbean roots . (Jamaica) (DNA)  *Take the test.

description: Welcome to the Plaza Suite, a newly renovated studio condo in an historic Center Square mansion. host_about: Retired from the 35 year career in Telecommunications on the West Coast. I now divide my time between Sarasota, Florida and Albany, New York. One of those properties is now available on airbnb. I actively enjoy local as well as international travel.

description:
Our spacious 2048 sq. ft. 5 bedroom. 2 bath, house is the perfect place for serious minded groups.

Welcome to Albany
host_about:
Michael and I are foodies. We love cooking and sharing what we cook with our family and friends. 
We love dancing and music, but most importantly we love a peaceful home.
In my travels, especially business travel, I appreciated most my accommodations where it was clean, where I can feel as though I am home and the host took careful care to my need for peace and privacy. 
In our properties we love to give people the space to feel their privacy is considered, and enough interaction to make them feel as though they are home. We are Inn owners, therefore hosting is something we enjoy. 
Between Michael and I we have 5 sons. From ages 18 thru 33. All with the spirit of service.

name: Albany Medical/colleges/Dtwn Albany/Green ROOM O
description:
Private bedroom shared livingroom and shared bath on the 2nd fl
Mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, toaster and fans in room. No kitchen access
40 inch Tv with Firestick Security cameras exterior cameras and motion sensors in common areas, halls and non access areas..
NO extra visitors
Keyless bedroom and main entry locks

host_about:
We are fully vaccinated for Covid-19 with boosters. (Mother and daughter) Please note: Bad reviews are from guests breaking my house rules, not reading the listing description about my room spaces and amenities offered. Also, from racists, haters and misogynistic guests.
We are well traveled African American women and we take pride in our culture and ancestors. It is important to be our authentic selves, without being washed.  My home has ethnic food smells, flags, sarcastic signs, Black art, social justice signs and visiable security cameras. Yes! 5 out of eight letters of my name spell SHARE :) I was a home school/unschooled parent. (Florida and Nevada) My daughter graduated from University At Albany with honors. Class of 2020... and recently graduated with a master's degree.  Class of 2021. She is currently a PhD student at Stony Brook University.  We are hosts and guests of Airbnb. I am originally from Chicago and The Bronx. I am a non smoker and non drinker. We traveled to many states on a budget, including Alaska and Hawaii. We also traveled to: Canada, Mexico, Caribbean and Europe.  We loved Victoria, BC, Montreal, QC, Dublin, Ireland, Paris, France and Brussels, Belgium the most.  I love older homes with character and history. I am a proud owner of a "Turn Of A Century"  Classic American Foursquare. unique home. (1900)  Captain Arthur William Brandt was one of the previous owners. I had bought my house. in 1999.  We are passionate about social justice issues. We lived in Miami, Orlando/Winter Park, Las Vegas, Montreal and Dominican Republic. I enjoy watching home improvement shows and documentaries. I love to shop at thrift stores for rare, cultured and vintage finds. We love the beauty and peacefulness of nature. We love musicals and ballets. If your last name is (military) Brandt, (pharmacy) Schneible or (nursing)Wagenbaugh, (previous owners) I will offer you 25% off your daily rate. (Not by marriage) Check your Ancestry, Myheritage and 23andme accounts, we maybe related. ;)  I am 9% England/Wales, 3% South Asian  1% Irish, 3% Norway,  1% Native American, 1% Iberian Peninsula and you can guess the rest...lol...(African)  Maternal Melungeon ancestry.  We share paternal DNA with Ramesses lll...Egyptian royalty and my maternal 2nd great grandfather is Little Wyatt Tate and my maternal 4th great grandfather is Judge/senator Charles Tait of Georgia and Alabama... My daughter is 27% European. Caribbean roots . (Jamaica) (DNA)  *Take the test.

description: This tastefully decorated room has more than enough space for you to get cozy by the fire. A queen size bed, couch, sitting chair, and oversize beanbag all welcome you to this very comfortable space. The bathroom is shared with one other guest room. host_about: Airbnb has transformed every part of my life for the better. What began as a small side hustle has grown into a cornerstone of my own American Dream. As a high school teacher, I’ve always cherished shaping the future, but hosting on Airbnb allows me to fully embrace and enhance my present. It’s become a creative outlet, enabling me to express my passion for art and design by curating unique, welcoming spaces for my guests. I hope to see you soon!

host_about:
CUL LLC was founded in 2019 by Leo & Maloy for a simple purpose. To take the “air mattress” out of the Airbnb and help all wanderlust make breakfast. 

Through Leo’s international hospitality experience, and Maloy’s practice in customer service and custodianship, we aim to provide a higher standard of respite by focusing on Peace, Quiet, and Privacy, to take the stress out of your Journey. 

This means easy, accessible parking. Comfortable beds that don’t squeak. Solid, easy to connect wifi, and a kitchen stocked for cooking.

You have enough on your plate, so let us take care of you, as if our home was yours.

We provide the home so you can focus on making the memories. 

*Minority Owned & LGBT Owned Business*

name: Tuscan Garden Apt at Café Capriccio Albany, NY
description: This cozy 1-bedroom apartment is located on a cobblestone street in downtown Albany next to our celebrated restaurant, Café Capriccio, one of Albany's finest and most honored Italian restaurants for over 4 decades. host_about:
My family has owned and operated Café Capriccio, an award-winning restaurant in Albany NY since 1982. Since then, we have taken over a thousand travelers to Italy, especially to Fattoria Lavacchio, our vineyard home in the Chianti region of Tuscany.  Our Airbnbs are reminiscent of  the look and feel of our Tuscan experiences.
After a long career as a musician, music educator, and arts administrator, I am delighted to host your visit to Albany!

host_about: I'm from Kansas City, MO. I've driven the entire US, logging over a  million miles on a 10 year working road trip. I settled in Albany, NY, a hardworking, no-nonsense sort of town, drenched in history, education and politics. I love this town not just for the town itself as much as the location.
